original_text: Instead, we will love each other and we will speak God's true message. As a result, we will become more and more like Christ in every way. He is the head of his body, which is the church.
korean_text: 오직 사랑 안에서 참된 것을 하여 범사에 그에게까지 자랄지라 그는 머리니 곧 그리스도라

sentences.original_text: Instead, we will love each other
and we will speak God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 하나님의 진실한 메시지를 말할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: As a result, we will become more and more like Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과 우리는 점점 더 그리스도를 닮아갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He is the head of his body
